name: storage
scripts: lxc exec storage1 -- bash -c  "gluster peer probe 10.1.2.6"
lxc exec storage1 -- bash -c  "gluster peer probe 10.1.2.7"
lxc exec storage1 -- bash -c  "gluster volume create nas replica 3 10.1.2.5:/nas/ 10.1.2.6:/nas/ 10.1.2.7:/nas/ force"
lxc exec storage1 -- bash -c  "gluster volume start nas"
lxc config set storage1 security.privileged false
lxc config set storage2 security.privileged false
lxc config set storage3 security.privileged false
